channel.title: Year-in-Review on Greg Herlein
channel.description: Recent content in Year-in-Review on Greg Herlein

item.title: 2025 In Review: The Year AI Changed Everything
item.description: Looking back at 2025, one theme dominates: AI agentic programming went from novelty to necessity. This year transformed how I think about software development, career advice, and even my personal hardware projects. Here’s what I wrote about, what I learned, and what I expect in 2026.
